history.proof: intros Q p H. sauto lq: on depth: 3use: pO_reduceplus, reduce_in_pO. qsimpl time: 1 use: reduce_in_pO. qsimpl time: 1 use: pO_reduceplus,reduce_in_pO.

a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) -> forall (Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)) (p : list (Term A n)), inPolySet A A0 eqA n ltM p Q -> reduce A A0 A1 eqA invA chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Set
A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)

Goal:
forall (Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)) (p : list (Term A n)), reducestar Q (pO A n) p -> p = pO A n

Premises:
Inductive reducestar (Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)) : list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) -> Prop := reducestar0 : forall p q : list (Term A n), reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p q -> irreducible A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q q -> reducestar Q p q Arguments reducestar (_ _ _)%list_scope Arguments reducestar0 (_ _ _)%list_scope
poly : forall A : Set, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> forall n : nat, (mon n -> mon n -> Prop) -> Set
CoefStructure : forall (A : Set) (A0 : A), A -> forall eqA : A -> A -> Prop, (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A) -> Prop
OrderStructure : forall A : Set, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> (A -> A -> A) -> Prop
Record Q : Set := Qmake { Qnum : BinNums.Z; Qden : BinNums.positive } Arguments QArith_base.Qmake _%Z_scope _%positive_scope
mult_mon : forall d : nat, mon d -> mon d -> mon d
Inductive mon : nat -> Set := n_0 : mon 0 | c_n : forall d : nat, nat -> mon d -> mon (S d) Arguments mon _%nat_scope Arguments c_n (_ _)%nat_scope
pO : forall (A : Set) (n : nat), list (Term A n)
zero_mon : forall d : nat, mon d
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
reduce_in_pO : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> reduce A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p (pO A n)
pO_reduceplus : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}) (Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)) (p : list (Term A n)), list (Term A n) ->...-> p = pO A n
irreducible_eqp_com : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> irreducible A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q q
canonical_reduceplus : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) ->...-> canonical A0 eqA ltM q
canonical_reduce : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) ->...-> canonical A0 eqA ltM q
red_minus_zero_reduce : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> exists r1 : list (Term A n), reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p r1 /\ reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q q r1
reduce_mults : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> reduce A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q (mults multA (n:=n) a p) (mults multA (n:=n) a q)
reduceplus_mults : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q (mults multA (n:=n) a p) (mults multA (n:=n) a q)
ltP_reduce : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) ->...-> ltP (A:=A) ltM q p
reduceplus_mults_inv : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p q
order_reduceplus : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> ltP (A:=A) ltM q p \/ eqP A eqA n p q
reduceplus_mults_invf0 : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q r s

reduceplus_eqp_com : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q r s
reduceplus_skip : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q)
reduce_inv : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> reduce A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p q
red_plus_zero_reduce : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> exists r1 : list (Term A n), reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p r1 /\ reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q q (mults multA (n:=n) (invTerm invA (n:=n) (T1 A1 n)) r1)
reduce_inv2 : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> exists (x : list (Term A n)) (a : Term A n), ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a /\ inPolySet A A0 eqA n ltM x Q /\ canonical A0 eqA ltM x /\ eqP A eqA n q (minuspf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec p (mults multA (n:=n) a x))
minuspf_refl_eq : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> forall p : list (Term A n), minuspf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec p p = pO A n

reduce_mults_inv_lem : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> reduce A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q r (mults multA (n:=n) (invTerm invA (n:=n) (T1 A1 n)) q)
reduceplus_trans : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q x z
reduceplus_mults_invr : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p (mults multA (n:=n) (invTerm invA (n:=n) (T1 A1 n)) q)

```coq
intros Q p H.
induction H.
- simpl in *. apply reduce_in_pO.
- apply pO_reduceplus. assumption.
Qed.

original: intros Q p H. induction H. - simpl in *. apply reduce_in_pO. - apply pO_reduceplus. auto.
